channel.title: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted
channel.description:
http://www.cnn.com/2015/07/28/africa/zimbabwe-lion-killed/index.html
Cecil the lions final photograph : [img]http://i.imgur.com/Vc3IFkb.jpg?1[/img]
Your views on pissing on nature? My take, killing is great, human instinct.. but take it out on the local deer population. Not something expensive and majestic. Yes, I am American.

item.title: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Pure_, great post! This quote “over-population in the region” is hard to agree with. Allan Savory presented at TED talks his experiences with “over population” and it’s quite surprising!

Check it out!

Read full topic
item.source: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted

item.title: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“sini, post:16, topic:552680”]why does everyone give a fudge about some lion you will never interact with or probably would have ever saw[/quote]extinction?

I for one agree with rodger to some extent. I don’t think we should be hunting animals for the fuck of it, especially rare ones which are under threat due to poaching, etc etc. I think that if you hunt an animal it’s ok if: over-population in the region, food (like you have no access to a store or something) or it’s your job (farming or whatever).

ps i didnt sit here and concentrate on listing more but im sure there are several more cases
this is 2015 not africa

Read full topic
item.source: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted

item.title: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

sini:

why does everyone give a fudge about some lion you will never interact with or probably would have ever saw

My personal belief on the subject relates to evolution. The species that is best adapted to it’s environment is going to stick around. Who are we to declare that humans are the species that will overcome all obstacles? My belief is that all variations in species should have a fair shot at the natural process. Unfortunately, there are 40,000 lions or less left?

That Rhino being killed this or last year, I understand that. It was near its end so the guy paid the government xxx,xxx dollars to pull off the deal and he had scientists come out and do their crap, then donated the body to local tribe which fed their village for weeks. The animal was going to die in 2 years time and lived a long life. It’s fair because the local people who monitor their resources voted and allowed it.

+Bowser jr is right, the internet loves cats. I hate the ones people keep in their homes but lions are adorable as fudge.

Read full topic
item.source: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted

item.title: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted

why does everyone give a fudge about some lion you will never interact with or probably would have ever saw

item.title: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:15, topic:552680”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=671595.msg4491372#msg4491372 date=1438221161]

[quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=671595.msg4491354#msg4491354 date=1438216611]

Leave it to liberals to try and take away hunting because someone fucked up lol. Very shocking.
[/quote]Leave it to conservatives who are doing the exact opposite of conserving. Very shocking.

I don’t consider myself a ‘conservative’.

@Rodgerwilco, that comment wasn’t directed at you. There’s a reason game laws are in effect, and the Game Warden’s around these parts are VERY strict and it’s hard to get away with anything stupid anyways, and there’s a reason they’re so serious.
[/quote]Well considering your beliefs, if you’re not a conservative you’re a radical, so I don’t need to guess what you consider your self to be… All right wings are conservatives in a fashion.[/quote]
You’re right. However I find many of the belief’s of what you consider conservatives, republicans, radicals, etc. to be extremely condescending, ignorant, and unnecessary.

Read full topic

item.title: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Death Style:

when you got the 13th gun did you think you needed another 3

Fortunately 4 of them are from my grandparents. Yes, I feel its appropriate to own all of them especially with the fact that they are going to be one of my largest returns (% wise) if and when I choose to sell them. If I could go back though, I would of probably just dumped that money into ammo and not the actual guns because those are even a greater investment.

Read full topic

item.title: Cecil the Lion Killed : Idiot American Wanted
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:6, topic:552680”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=671595.msg4491237#msg4491237 date=1438148608]
Leave it to liberals to try and take away hunting because someone fucked up lol. Very shocking.
[/quote]see guns r bad!!11Oen!!!1[/quote]

I own 16 guns, but I have a brain and I don’t go out shooting people or important animals. Important as in, majestic, unique, rare. I will on the other hand, do my fair share with the local over populated raccoons. There is a difference, all it takes is a brain and some self control to realize it.

Read full topic
